tool_description: Retrieves the top twenty most streamed artists on Spotify for this month.
name: Spotify Monthly Listeners
title: Spotify Monthly Listeners

api_list.name: GET Info
api_list.description: Retrieves the information for top 20 most streamed artists and their monthly listener count.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-monthly-listeners.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-monthly-listeners.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spotify-monthly-listeners.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spotify-monthly-listeners.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
